sentences.english: Why did the universe emerge from the Big Bang the way it did?
sentences.chinese: 宇宙緣何要從大霹靂中冒出來呢？

sentences.english: This of course begs the question, why the lower grades?
sentences.chinese: 當然，這樣又迴歸問題本身了，緣何分數就偏低呢？

sentences.english: TV Media, Why is it Strong all the way?

sentences.english: However, why women do not have the world's top brand in China?
sentences.chinese: 但是，中國女裝緣何沒有世界頂級品牌？
